column2: Wildcraft Unisex Brown UV Protected Sunglasses
column19:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Look stylish in these trendy sunglasses from Wildcraft that come with detachable lens. The set consists of a pair of black and brown lens that can be changed according to your wish. A must have for the ones who enjoy the outdoors.

  • Product Details

  • Lens colour: brown
column20:
black
Lens type: tinted glass lens with 100% UV protection
Frame colour: white
Frame type: plastic with detachable lens
Flexible hinges for durability
Fixed nose holder with a thick nose bridge which is part of the frame to hold the glasses in place
column21:
ensuring there is no friction with the skin
The glasses come with a sturdy case and a micro fibre cloth to keep the accessory clean
A detachable strap to secure the glasses while you're on the move
Please note that the thread colour in the brand logo may vary from the image shown

  • Material & Care

  • Plastic
    Remove dust and grime by gently wiping the lens with the cloth provided
    Remove oil or tough stains with the help of a lens cleaner
    Do not use your fingers on such stains
    Do not place glasses on uneven surface or heated areas like the dashboard of a car

  • Size & Fit

  • Lens width: 70 mm
